author: James Joyce
text: Dear Budgen: I return your article and hope the F.R. takes it. A pity you did not develop your ideas about the landscape. You ought to get them down anyway. Linati’s [?] article has a paragraph that bears on a page of your article, I thought, so I send it. Perhaps you can puzzle it out from the French. ‘Raggi iccasse’ is the Italian for X-rays. These suggestions:
